name: Jam #23
description:
This is the first prototype of the game we're making for our Jam#23! Your feedback is most welcome! We're especially interested in the way you feel while playing, and advices you could give us to improve the game! We'll discuss the feedback this Sunday to decide next week's priorities and make changes to the Game Design!

Game
You play an errand-boy supposed to save the world provide the necessary stuff to true Heroes so they can save the world.

Controls
- WASD - directional arrows to move
- E to interact
- Mouse to navigate in dialogs and GUI

Concept
What we're trying to do this time is to work around the concept of Overload. We put the player under pressure: lots of things to do, not enough time, many things  happening simultaneously, social pressure from the NPCs and tons of parasite solicitations.

We're working on this game from the 13th of June till the 11th of July.
Week #1 - Collective Game Design
Week #2 - Prototype #1
Week #3 - Prototype #2
Week #4 - Final version
